com.ikeirnez.communicationsframework.api.connection

Interface Connection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AuthenticatedClientConnection, AuthenticatedConnection, AuthenticatedServerConnection, ClientConnection, ServerConnection

    public interface Connection
extends Closeable
    Represents a connection.
    Author:
    iKeirNez

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getHostName()
      Gets the hostname that this Connection will connect to (may be null in some ServerConnection instances)
      int getPort()
      Gets the port this Connection will use for the connection
      InetSocketAddress getSocketAddress()
      Gets the address that this Connection will connect to (hostname may be null in some ServerConnection cases)
      boolean isConnected()
      Gets the connected state of this connection
      void sendPacket(Packet packet)
      Sends a packet via this connection to the other side
      void sendPacket(Packet packet, boolean queueIfNotConnected)
      Sends a packet via this connection to the other side

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Gets the connected state of this connection
        Returns:
        The connected state

      • getSocketAddress

        InetSocketAddress getSocketAddress()
        Gets the address that this Connection will connect to (hostname may be null in some ServerConnection cases)
        Returns:
        The address that this Connection will connect to/listen for

      • getHostName

        String getHostName()
        Gets the hostname that this Connection will connect to (may be null in some ServerConnection instances)
        Returns:
        The address that this Connection will connect to

      • getPort

        int getPort()
        Gets the port this Connection will use for the connection
        Returns:
        The port

      • sendPacket

        void sendPacket(Packet packet,
                boolean queueIfNotConnected)
        Sends a packet via this connection to the other side
        Parameters:
        packet - The packet instance to send
        queueIfNotConnected - If this connection is not currently connected (lost connection or initialising connection) defaults to true

      • sendPacket

        void sendPacket(Packet packet)
        Sends a packet via this connection to the other side
        Parameters:
        packet - The packet instance to send
